document.full_text: three wildfires fueled by tinder-dry vegetation and fanned by high winds forced the evacuation of 320 homes in the foothills west of denver on monday, fire officials said.
document.title: colorado wildfires threaten hundreds of homes
lines_and_colors: three wildfires fueled by tinder-dry vegetation and fanned by high winds forced the evacuation of 320 homes in the foothills west of denver on monday, fire officials said.
